ygData.subject: Re: Blacknightmare
ygData.msgSnippet: Attack YOU?  You yourself admitted that you were going to kill her. No matter what reason you might give me, I cannot allow you to kill her. he said sternly.

"Attack YOU?  You yourself admitted that you were going to kill her. 
No ma=
tter what reason you might give me, I cannot allow you to kill
her." he sai=
d sternly.

"Now I am going to bring her back to our base; I'm going to kee=
p her
under watch in a security cell, and until I have an idea of what she
=
was doing out here, I'm going to keep her there.  Are you going to
stop me?=
"
